text: (madeene ka muhaasera karane vaale chal bhee die magar) ye log abhee yahee samajh rahe hain ki (kaafiron ke) lashkar abhee nahin gae aur agar kaheen (kuphphaar ka) lashkar phir aa pahunche to ye log chaahenge ki kaash vah jangalon mein ganvaaron mein ja basate aur (vaheen se baithe baithe) tumhaare haalaat darayaapht karate rahate aur agar unako tum logon mein rahana padata to faqat (peechha chhudaane ko) zara zahoor (kaheen) ladate
